data.message: Proud of Febin Bellamy and his work sharing the stories of the many inspiring Unsung Heroes like Oneil. Hoya Saxa!

replies.message: Thank you for the support, Georgetown!!! #Hoyasaxa
Febin tell your mom I love your name.
We love sharing examples of people building community, and seeing his alma mater support Febin is truly inspiring. Have a great day! -Elizabeth

Febin Bellamy  THANK YOU for thinking of others and for being YOU. Now, you need to figure out how to clone yourself so we can make this world a better place FASTER!   🤣  May your future be as wonderful as you.
Tell Oneil I pray he gets his restaurant soon, that chicken looked so good it made my mouth water. I know he is one great chief!!
the world really needs more young men/women like this. Thank you. P.S. I work at  Kansas University and it is great getting to know some of the students here on campus. Keep up the good work.

Lexie Thomas I hope your angry face on Facebook's comment was on accident because there is nothing in this world that you could hate in their comment, the original comment or the video! God bless Mr. Febin and may his work continue on campus by other students and spread to other Colleges and Universities!!!
I could wish all my former students were so inspired!          Mary Thomas
Proud of Mr Febin, thank you
